greet: Evening gentle bartender! Just come back from the honeymoon with my sweetie, I'm happy to see a new face!
The previous owner was suuuper nice, but you look like a really good person too!
Can I kindly ask for a Ripple?
leaveCorrect: THIS IS THE BEST RIPPLE I'VE EVER HAD! I'm so happy to have come here tonight! Honey, you should try it too!
leaveWrong: Oh, I like it. I mean, it's not like the one the previous owner used to make, but it's still good.
leaveWater: Thank you gentle man! I like it, just a bit more alcochol and it would be PERFECT! See you soon!

greet: Good evening bartender. I'm Doris, by the way. I'm a regular here, but I've never seen you before.
You have already met my enthusiastic husband, Eugene. Isn't he a darling?
I would like to try a <b>Ripple>/b> too, please.
leaveCorrect: Thank you gentle man, this is a very good Ripple. The balance of ingredients is perfect, a real delight.
We'll be back soon, I'm sure of it. Nice posters out there, by the way.
leaveWrong: It's not bad, but it's not a Ripple. I'm sure you'll get it right next time.
Oh, and always remember to clean the counter wood after spilling the drink, by the way!
leaveWater: Not a perfect balance of ingredients, but it's still a good drink. See you next time, bartender.
Eugene, we have to go honey. You will continue dancing with me at home.

greet: Oh, wonderful to see you again, dear bartender! My day was so busy that I almost forgot to come here.
But it improved when I found out Davidine Betty will attend the ball tonight, right here in Korgis. If only I could attend too...
May I get a Spring Bee, please?
leaveCorrect:
Perfect cocktail, dear bartender. I wonder when this recipe was invented...
I shall go home now, and rehearse some lines. Goodnight!
leaveWrong:
Oh... I'm afraid this is not the right cocktail.
It's alright, I'll come back another day... Goodnight, bartender!
leaveWater:
Thank you, dear bartender.
Well, I might go home now and rehearse some lines... Goodnight!

greet:
Welcome back, fella. Chaotic week, this one, for the government. Aaalways up to no good.
Well? Will you make me an Everest?
leaveCorrect:
Aaah, just how I like it. Thank you very much, and here's a tip for your work.
Goodnight, fella! And always learn from the adults!
leaveWrong:
Argh, this is terrible... Are you sure you're following the recipe?
I'll be off now. Goodnight.
leaveWater:
Refreshing for sure, and I'm sure it could taste even better. You do need more experience...
In any case, at ease, fella! Goodnight!

greet: Bonsoir, barman. This establishment was recommended to me by a trusted client.
You may want to consider investing in alcohol stocks by the way… Prices have been increasing lately, what with the debates in the government.
I would like to try out a Magazine now, s'il vous plaît.
leaveCorrect:
Excellent cocktail, barman. It seems I'll recommend this place to someone else in turn. I wonder if I could spend some bonding time with my son here…
Bonne nuit, barman.
leaveWrong:
I'm confused. I thought this was a different type of bar. Maybe you've made the wrong cocktail because you got afraid of me.
I may retry in the future. Au revoir.
leaveWater:
Oh. A watered drink.
Not the best of impression, and not very polite. But as a fellow entrepreneur I understand the necessity. Have a good night, au revoir.

greet: Good to see you again there. It seems like this place is picking up the pace with the customers, even though you've new in the neighborhood.
One Parti for me, please. And shaken, not stirred, if it's not too much to ask.
leaveCorrect:
A fantastic drink, no doubt. It's nice to come here after work and find this welcoming atmosphere.
Oh, I'm overstaying my welcome. Have a good night.
leaveWrong: This is hardly a Parti. I'm afraid you haven't followed the recipe that well. At any rate, farewell and have a nice day.
leaveWater: Nice drink. It's nice to come here after work to unwind a little bit. Thank you and have a good night.

greet:
Well, hello again. I didn't notice it before but that plant over there is very pretty. It would fit well in my house.
...or is it part of the wallpaper? I can't tell.
An Everest for me now! I don't have all day.
leaveCorrect:
You've improved from the last time I was here! But I'll have you know you still have a long way to go.
Bye bye!
leaveWrong: Pah! Definitely a downgrade from last time! Heading out now!
leaveWater:
You haven't improved much from the last time I was here. I'll have you know you still have a long way to go!
Bye bye!

greet: Hello again! I'm not sure what brought me to this street again today, but I sure am glad to be here. This bar's energy is a mystery I want to solve.
I'm not a sophisticate drinker (I usually down pints in England...) but I've been pushing my boundaries a bit. Can you get me a Parti?
leaveCorrect:
Cheers! Better than a pint, innit?
